content: colorwork yokes are not just for knitters this wintry sweater features a tapestry crochet motif inspired by the icy points of a snowflake made with beautiful palette yarn the color combinations are endless be sure to choose a dark a medium and a light tone so that the colorwork really shines the pulmu pullover is a classic colorwork yoke sweater worked in the round from the top down short row are used just below the colorwork section to raise the back neck of the sweater ribbing is created in turned row and joined as you go to the hem wrists and neckline sizes 44 75 47 75 50 25 53 56 have a wider chest front measurement than chest back measurement to accommodate for a larger bust front measures 1 25 2 3 3 75 5 ″ wider than back
